title: HOUR 2- Mark Grant Oct 06, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Mark Grant Oct 06, 2020
description:
Mark Grant gives Dan his Harry Carey impression. Mark says that he actually got emotional once the Padres made the playoffs, Mark tells Dan that he was tired of the Dodgers and the Cardinals treating the Padres like they were the step child of the National League.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
